overview: TJ Modi, Founder and CEO TJ has over 22 years of combined experience in executive management, information technology, and entrepreneurship. Prior to establishing Monetize Media, TJ was the Co-Founder and CEO of InterBase Corporation, a global information technology and services company that he helped to grow from start-up to its current size of over $5 million in annual revenues. In addition to identifying and closing sales deals with major clients such as Cisco Systems, Deutsche Bank, and the Los Angeles County Metropolitan Transportation Authority, TJ also trained the firmâ€™s marketing staff and managed funding activities. Before that, he was among the first ten employees at Strategic Information Group, where he assessed and expanded sales markets, managed client contracts, and played an instrumental role in growing annual revenues from $1 million to $15 million. TJ has a Masters in Computer Science and Bachelors in Electronics from Gujarat University in India.
